business.headline: IndiGo, Air France-KLM, Virgin Atlantic join hands to enhance travel to US, EuropeTo enhance air connectivity from India to Europe and North America, IndiGo, Delta Air Lines, Air France-KLM and Virgin Atlantic announced a partnership.

India orders IndiGo to end agreement with Turkish Airlines amid diplomatic tensionsThe Indian government has ordered IndiGo Airlines to terminate its damp lease agreement with Turkish Airlines by August 31. This decision comes in response to Turkey's continued support for Pakistan against India. The aviation regulator DGCA has granted a final three-month extension to the current lease, which was set to expire on May 31. IndiGo is currently operating two Boeing aircraft on damp lease from Turkish Airlines. The move is part of India's broader response to Turkey's actions, including supplying arms to Pakistan and condemning India's Operation Sindhu.

India reduces import tax on crude edible oils by 10% to bring down food pricesThe reduction in import tax will effectively bring down the total import duty on the three oils to 16.5 per cent from an earlier 27.5 per cent.

IndiGo to cut ties with Turkish Airlines amid row over Ankara's support to PakThe Directorate General of Civil Aviation said IndiGo gave an undertaking that it will terminate the lease with Turkish Airlines by August 31 and will not seek a further extension.

ITR-1 and ITR-4 Excel utilities out: Check who can file and what's new this yearExcel utilities for ITR-1 and ITR-4 are now available for AY 2025–26. Taxpayers can visit the income tax e-filing site to download and use them for filing returns for FY 2024–25.
Gensol misses May payment for loan on BluSmart cabs: ReportGensol Engineering reportedly missed a payment of about Rs 4 crore to its pass-through certificate (PTC) holders in May.
India's economic growth hits 4-year low of 6.5% in FY25The real GDP growth for the March quarter (Q4) stood at 7.4%, which is the fastest among all four quarters of the year.
Sensex closes 182 points lower, Nifty below 24,800; IT stocks drag marketsThe S&P BSE Sensex was down by 182 points to end at 81,451.01, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 82.90 points to close at 24,750.70.

From UPI withdrawals to online corrections: 5 expected features of EPFO 3.0EPFO's upcoming system aims to enhance financial flexibility for employees with features like instant UPI and ATM withdrawals, auto-claim settlements, and expanded withdrawal reasons.

Meet Leena Tewari, the USV chairperson who bought India's costliest flatsLeena is the chairperson of USV, a Mumbai-based pharmaceutical company, which was started by her late father, Vithal Gandhi, in partnership with Revlon in 1961. Forbes estimates Leena's net worth at $3.9 billion, as of May 30, 2025, making her one of India's richest women.

Explained: Why Arshad Warsi, wife Maria Goretti were banned by Sebi for 1 yearArshad Warsi and Maria Goretti bought shares of Sadhna Broadcast Limited (now known as Crystal Business System Ltd) from other individuals who were also named in the Sebi order.

How Trump's tariff tsunami is reshaping global economyIn just over four months, Trump's flurry of trade actions, alternating between shock-and-awe tariffs and strategic pauses, has upended conventional expectations.

entertainment.headline: Aamir Khan calls marriage to Reena Dutta jawani ka josh: Timing was a mistakeActor Aamir Khan reflected upon 16 years of marriage to Reena Dutta. The actor shared that he doesn't regret marrying Reena, because in her, he found a friend for life, but the timing of the marriage.

BTS kicks off 2025 FESTA with laughter, legacy, and Bangtan vibesBTS has launched the '2025 BTS FESTA' to celebrate their 12th debut anniversary, marking a heartfelt and playful reunion stage for the group post military service. The event sets the tone for an eagerly awaited full-group comeback later this year or early next year.

Actor Sreeleela sits in basket, shares family celebration before birthday. PicsActor Sreeleela shared a nostalgic pre-birthday post on social media with her family. In the pictures, she is seen dressed traditionally, sitting in a basket as her family members shower her with blessings and love.

Time exposes, says director Raj Nidimoru's wife amid rumours of him dating SamanthaAs the rumours of Samantha dating director Raj Nidimoru spread on social media, his wife, Shyyamali De, shared a cryptic note on Instagram, mentioning 'karma' and 'time'.

Hope I die with my shoes on: Aamir Khan says Mahabharat could be his last spectacleAamir Khan recently spoke about the possibility of his ambitious project based on the epic Mahabharat. He also hinted at it being the final film project of his career after 'Sitaare Zameen Par'. The actor reflected on the reason why he felt so.

Stranger Things 5 to have 3 parts: Plot, cast, release date - all you need to know'Stranger Things Season 5' finale will release on New Year's Eve. Netflix has split the last season into three parts. Here's all you need to know about one of the most celebrated fantasy thrillers.

Indian TV was better in the 90s - and it's not just nostalgiaWhen television was a reflection of life, not a cacophony of drama and excess, the golden era of Indian TV in the 90s brought stories that resonated with the soul and characters that felt like family.

Accepting blessings again: Actor Nakuul Mehta, Jankee announce second pregnancy'Ishqbaaz' star Nakuul Mehta is going to welcome his second child with wife Jankee soon. The couple announced good news with a few pictures on social media.

Bees Saal Baad: Timeless mystery of an English babu, village belle, and desi ghostDecades may have passed, but the eerie echoes of 'Bees Saal Baad' still send a chill down the spine - proof that true horror never fades, it lingers.

Himesh Reshammiya praises Paresh Rawal for Hera Pheri mid-concertDurig his concert in Mumbai, singer Himesh Reshammiya, before breaking into the 'Jumme Raat' song, started praising actor Paresh Rawal for his performances in the 'Hera Pheri' movies.

Squid Game 3 trailer: Equal parts chilling and excitingSeveral characters who were not given enough screen time in Season 2, reappear in Season 3 with more. The trailer of 'Squid Game Season 3' features deadlier games and an iconic face-off.

Won't allow Thug Life's release: Protests against Kamal Haasan intensifyActor Kamal Haasan's effigies were burnt across Karnataka as protests against the actor intensified amid the language row. His film, 'Thug Life', is scheduled to release on June 5.

Khaleja re-release box office Day 2: Mahesh Babu's film hunts records globallyMahesh Babu's 'Khaleja' re-released in theatres on May 30, and the film has already started setting fresh records at the box office. It has emerged as the biggest Indian re-release opener in North America.

Bhool Chuk Maaf box office Day 9: Rajkummar Rao's film smashes Rs 50 crore mark'Bhool Chuk Maaf' has entered its second weekend at the box office. The film has seen fantastic growth in its second Saturday collection, moving past the benchmark of Rs 50 crore.

Nagarjuna invites Revanth Reddy to younger son Akhil Akkineni-Zainab's weddingActor Nagarjuna met Telangana Chief Minister Revanth Reddy to extend the invitation to his son Akhil Akkineni's wedding with Zainab Ravdjee. He was accompanied by his wife Amala and the bride's parents.

Dhanush, Aishwarya Rajinikanth come together for son's school graduation. PicsDhanush and Aishwarya Rajinikanth were proud parents as their eldest son, Yathra, graduated from school. The couple got divorced in November 2024.

Bring back Chinmayi: Samantha supports singer after being shadow-banned for 8 yearsActor Samantha Ruth Prabhu shared singer Chinmayi Sripada's viral clip from 'Thug Life' music launch event. She questioned the ban on the singer since 2018.

Naga Chaitanya wishes lady love Sobhita Dhulipala on birthday with vacation picActor Naga Chaitanya wished his wife Sobhita Dhuliapala on her thirty third birthday with a cute selfie. The post drew warm reactions from fans.

Samantha plays pickleball with Raj Nidimoru, gives glimpse of her happy weekendActor Samantha Ruth Prabhu shared a clip of herself playing pickleball with director Raj Nidimoru. The two are rumoured to be dating.

general news.headline: Secularism must..: Pawan Kalyan, Kangana question Sharmistha Panoli's arrestInfluencer Sharmistha Panoli was arrested by Kolkata Police from Gurugram over a social media post on Operation Sindoor which drew massive backlash. Multiple FIRs were filed against Panoli after she allegedly used abusive and politically-charged language in the video.

Mamata Banerjee opened borders to Bangladeshis, can't stop infiltration: Amit ShahSounding the poll bugle in West Bengal ahead of the 2026 Assembly elections, Amit Shah said the elections in the state will not only determine the future of Bengal but also have implications for national security.

Why did defence chief speak from Singapore? Congress rebuke with Vajpayee lessonCongress leader Jairam Ramesh said CDS General Anil Chauhan's admission of military losses during Operation Sindoor warrants serious political discussion and criticised the Defence Minister for not briefing political parties before such revelations were made abroad.

Sheikh Hasina charged with crimes against humanity during Bangladesh protestsSheikh Hasina, former Bangladesh Prime Minister, has been charged with crimes against humanity for allegedly ordering violent crackdowns during the 2024 student-led uprising.

In tiger territory, LPG and toilet emerge as big lifesaversIn tiger territories across India, a humble toilet and LPG connection at home are saving precious lives. This success story of the Swachh Bharat Yojana and the Ujjwala scheme is unfolding in faraway forests even as overall deaths from tiger attacks rise in India.

50 bombs, 30 seconds: How Israel eliminated Hamas top commander Muhammad SinwarNearly three weeks after a deadly Israeli airstrike in Gaza, the Israeli Defense Forces (IDF) released footage it claimed shows a Hamas command center beneath a hospital where key operatives, including Muhammad Sinwar, were killed.

Stop blaming others: India rips Pak at UN meet over Indus Waters Treaty remarkIndia dismissed Pakistan PM Shehbaz Sharif's remarks on the Indus Waters Treaty as unwarranted, asserting at a UN conference that Islamabad's support for cross-border terrorism is the real obstacle to the treaty's implementation.

3,800 hit as heavy rain in Manipur maroons localities, damages several housesTwo people were injured and 3,802 individuals were affected as flash floods triggered by torrential rain in Manipur caused rivers to overflow, damaged 883 houses and killed 64 domestic animals.

Viral post, arrest and political slugfest: What's the Sharmistha Panoli controversyA political slugfest erupted after the arrest of 22-year-old social media influencer Sharmistha Panoli over a controversial video on Operation Sindoor. The 22-year-old law student was booked after she used abusive and communally-charged language in her video.

All eyes on Sharmistha Panoli: Dutch MP backs student arrested for Op Sindoor post

Sharmistha Panoli's arrest by Kolkata Police over a controversial tweet targeting a particular community in connection with Operation Sindoor has sparked widespread criticism of the Bengal government. A Dutch parliamentarian has urged PM Modi to 'help' her, while the BJP has accused Mamata Banerjee of appeasement.

15-year-old gang-raped twice in 2 months in Karnataka; threatened with videoA girl was repeatedly gang-raped in Karnataka's Belagavi in December. Six perpetrators assaulted her in a secluded area, recording the incident on their mobile phones, the local police said.

Chirag Paswan to contest Bihar Assembly polls? What his party leader saidInternal chatter within the Lok Janshakti Party (Ram Vilas) has projected Chirag Paswan as the chief ministerial candidate for the upcoming Bihar Assembly elections.

Chairs thrown at UP wedding after baraatis clash over cooler. Video goes viralA wedding in Jhansi turned chaotic after a fight broke out between guests over a cooler. A viral video of the incident shows several people hurling chairs at each other.

PSG win sparks clashes in France; 17-year-old among 2 killed, hundreds arrestedThousands of supporters thronged the streets of Paris to celebrate PSG's win over Inter Milan in Munich. However, violent protests broke out soon after, prompting Interior Minister Bruno Retailleau to say, 'Barbarians have taken to the streets of Paris.'

30 killed, scores injured as Israeli forces open fire near Gaza aid centreAt least 30 Palestinians were killed and over 115 injured after Israeli forces opened fire near a US-funded aid centre in Rafah, prompting Hamas to call it a "massacre" amid ceasefire tensions.

363 fresh cases take India's Covid tally past 3,700-mark; 4 deaths reportedIndia's active Covid-19 caseload has surged over 14-fold in ten days, driven by Omicron subvariants, with Kerala reporting the highest number of cases.

Giant solar explosion to hit Earth today, trigger geomagnetic stormNasa and Noaa models agree that the explosion will strike our planet sometime on June 1.

Terrorist became a father while in jail: Asaduddin Owaisi exposes Pak in AlgeriaAsaduddin Owaisi cited an example of Pakistan handing out special treatment to the mastermind of the 26/11 Mumbai attacks, Zakiur Rehman Lakhvi, while he was in jail. Addressing the Indian diaspora, the Hyderabad MP highlighted that a high-profile prisoner like Lakhvi was allowed to become a father while incarcerated.

Fed drug-laced laddoo, gang-raped at Kanpur ashram: Taekwondo player's big chargeThe woman alleged she was given a laddoo inside the ashram and passed out shortly after consuming it. She claimed that she was then gang-raped by Mahto, the ashram's mahant (chief priest), and several others.

Satya Nadella reveals the real reason why Microsoft fired 6,000 employeesMicrosoft CEO Satya Nadella has finally opened up to reveal the real reason why the company fired 6,000 employees, which makes up 3 per cent of the total workforce.

sports.headline: Fan asks Rohit about his batting weakness, India star gives hilarious answerRohit Sharma was recently asked to reveal his batting weakness by a young fan, but his hilarious reply stole the show. Rohit recently scored a match-winning 81 (50) vs Gujarat Titans.

French Open Day 8 LIVE: Paolini, Paul win opening sets, Bopanna up nextFrench Open 2025, Day 8 Live Updates: Jasmine Paolini and Elina Svitolina start off on Centre Court while Tommy Paul and Alexei Popyrin play at Suzanne Lenglen. The clash between Elena Rybakina and Iga Swiatek is expected to be a cracker. Rohan Bopanna is currently playing in the third round of men's doubles.

Shreyas Iyer needs to play county cricket if he's serious about Tests: PanesarFormer England spinner Monty Panesar said that Shreyas Iyer should prove his Test credentials to the national selectors by playing county cricket.

South Africa to play warm-up game vs Zimbabwe in preparation for WTC finalSouth Africa cricket team will take on Zimbabwe in a four-day warm-up fixture to prepare for the World Test Championship (WTC) final 2025 against Australia.

Bumrah is the vaccine that can cure any illness for bowling side: Varun AaronFormer India cricketer turned commentator Varun Aaron has come up with a unique 'vaccine' analogy for Jasprit Bumrah saying that he can cure any illness for the bowling side.

PSG beat Inter Milan 5-0 to claim their maiden Champions League title.

Virat Kohli bailed out of the challenging England tour, claims former spinnerStar India batter Virat Kohli bailed out of the challenging England tour, feels former England spinner Monty Panesar. Kohli announced his retirement from Tests ahead of the all-important series set to begin from June 20.

No Mbappe, No Problem: How Enrique's PSG conquered Europe without superstarsLuis Enrique transformed PSG from star-studded chaos to a disciplined powerhouse, leading them to their first Champions League title in 2025. His tactical overhaul ended years of heartbreak, finally delivering glory.

Tom Haines leads England Lions' fightback as Karun Nair's 204 help India A post 557Tom Haines hundred led the fightback for England Lions against India A after the visitors posted 557 on Saturday, May 31. Karun Nair starred for India A with 204 runs and received support from Dhruv Jurel and Sarfaraz Khan.

French Open: Djokovic advances to 4th Round with dominant win vs MisolicNovak Djokovic continued his dominant run at the French Open, advancing smoothly to the fourth round after a straight sets win over Filip Musolic. Meanwhile, India's N Sriram Balaji saw his campaign end early in the doubles draw.

Kylian Mbappe, David Beckham congratulate PSG after 1st Champions League winKylian Mbappe and David Beckham led the way with the praises for PSG as they thrashed Inter Milan to win their first-ever Champions League title on Saturday, May 31. PSG won the match 5-0 in Munich.

PSG secure 1st UEFA Champions League title with record thrashing of Inter MilanPSG secured their first UEFA Champions League title as they thumped Inter Milan 5-0 in Munich on Saturday, May 31. Desire Doue was the star of the show as he scored a brace and setup the opening goal for PSG.

Dinesh Karthik will be unbearable if RCB win IPL 2025 title: Naseer HussainNasser Hussain joked that Dinesh Karthik would become unbearable if RCB end up winning the IPL 2025 title. Karthik has made an impact as the batting mentor for the Bengaluru franchise this season.

Coco Gauff advances to Roland Garros 4th round, Keys makes comeback winCoco Gauff showed resilience, winning a tight second-set tiebreak to advance to the French Open fourth round. Madison Keys staged an incredible comeback, saving three match points to secure a thrilling all-American victory and move into the next round.

Pro Kabaddi League 12 auction: Shadloui creates history, Pardeep Narwal goes unsoldMohammadreza Shadloui created history on Saturday, May 31 during Day 1 of the Pro Kabaddi League season 12 auction as he was bought by the Gujarat Giants for Rs. 2.23 Crores. Three-time Pardeep Narwal went unsold on Day 1 of the auction.

Manchester United will improve next season after poor 2024-25: Harry MaguireManchester United defender Harry Maguire said that the team will improve next season after their horror 2024-25 campaign. United finished 15th in the Premier League and went trophyless during 2024-25.

Former Rajasthan Royal co-owner threatens to expose financial irregularitiesFormer Rajasthan Royals co-owner Raj Kundra has stirred fresh controversy by alleging financial misconduct and offshore laundering by a top team promoter—adding to the franchise's woes after their disastrous IPL 2025 campaign.

UCL final Highlights: PSG lift the trophy with a 5-0 dominance vs Inter MilanUEFA Champions League Final Highlights: Paris Saint Germain have touched history with their maiden UCL title after a dominating 5-0 win over Inter Milan. Luis Enrique's men simply ran an onslaught over Simeone Inzaghi's Inter. Double goal from Doue, a goal a piece from Kvaratskhelia, Emery and Hakimi seal the dream win for PSG.

Dabang Delhi crush Jaipur Patriots 11-4 to begin UTT 2025 campaignDabang Delhi TTC kicked off their UTT 2025 journey in style, overpowering Jaipur Patriots 11-4 with dominant performances from Sathiyan Gnanasekaran, Quek Izaac, and Diya Chitale in the season opener on Saturday.

Indian team support staff confirms exit, Siraj pens heartfelt goodbyeSoham Desai has announced his departure from his role as the Indian cricket team's strength and conditioning coach. His exit marks a significant change following staff reshuffles after the Border-Gavaskar Trophy 2024–25.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
